The explorer list, how much can you discover?

The score is determined by three values. How many takes you did this round, how many hours you spent turfing and how many round-unique zones you took this round.

Columns left to right: [Placement difference], [Place], [Turfplace], [Name], [Score], [% diff], [Turfscore] (Rotate screen for all data). Explanation and examples of score calculations.
